INSERT INTO Feature ( feat_no, feat_id, feat_title, feat_cont, pre_st_dt, pre_end_dt, st_dt, end_dt, stat_cd, pri_cd, prg, diff_cd, class_cd, use_yn, sys_no, mem_no, tm_no, prj_no ) VALUES ( #{featNo}, #{featId}, #{featTitle}, #{featDescription}, #{preStartDate}, NULL, #{preEndDate}, NULL, #{startDate}, NULL, #{endDate}, NULL, #{statusCode}, #{priorCode}, #{progress}, #{diffCode}, NULL, #{featClassCode}, NULL, 'Y', #{systemNo}, NULL, #{memberNo}, NULL, #{teamNo}, NULL, #{prjNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(SUM(f.prg) / COUNT(f.feat_no), 2) AS progress, COUNT(f.feat_no) AS total, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.prg < 100 AND SYSDATE < f.pre_end_dt THEN 1 END) AS present, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.prg = 100 THEN 1 END) AS complete, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.prg < 100 AND SYSDATE > f.pre_end_dt THEN 1 END) AS delay FROM System s JOIN Feature f ON f.sys_no = s.sys_no WHERE (s.sys_no = #{systemNo} OR s.sys_no IN ( SELECT sys_no FROM System START WITH sys_no = #{systemNo} CONNECT BY PRIOR sys_no = par_sys_no )) AND (#{featClassCd} IS NULL OR f.class_cd = #{featClassCd}) AND s.prj_no = #{prjNo}
